message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique product that I believe will greatly benefit your business. I'm offering it to you for $1800000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. Is that something we can work with?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I have to consider my costs and the value I've placed on the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1700000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1650000. Is that something we can work with?

I see you're willing to go down to $1650000, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1687500. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1625000. Is that something we can work with?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $1625000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, so I'll sell it to you for $1675000. This is a fair price, considering the value I've placed on the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1600000. Is that something we can work with?

Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'll sell it to you for $1662500. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1600000. This is my final offer.
